description: If a log record was generated as a result of a http request, the http interface can be used to collect this information.
title: Request

___body.description: Data should only contain the request body (not the query string). It can either be a dictionary (for standard HTTP requests) or a raw request body.

___url.description: A complete Url, with scheme, host and path.

___search.description: The search describes the query string of the request. It is expected to have values delimited by ampersands.

___cookies.description: A parsed key-value object of cookies

___headers.description: Should include any headers sent by the requester. Cookies will be taken by headers if supplied.

___cookie.description: Cookies sent with the request. It is expected to have values delimited by semicolons.

___env.description: The env variable is a compounded of environment information passed from the webserver.

___encrypted.description: Indicates whether request was sent as SSL/HTTPS request.
